fields.name: jdc_person_id
fields.title: JCOIN data commons person identifier
fields.description: The generated unique identifier specific to the JCOIN Data Commons for a given individual (client or staff).

fields.name: visit_number
fields.title: Visit Number
fields.description: A number that identifies the visit or timepoint of data collection (baseline=1 and each subsequent follow up is 2 or greater).

fields.name: visit_type
fields.title: Visit Type
fields.description: The visit type/category (either baseline or follow up)

fields.name: s1a
fields.title: Last time drug use
fields.description: Last time a person used alcohol or other drugs weekly or more often

custom.notes: Not reported not a part of the core measures but id'ed a few missing values that cant be accounted for by skip logic. In future, may want to make more precise
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: ... you used alcohol or other drugs weekly or more often?
custom.jcoin:core_measure_subsection_text: When was the last time you…

fields.name: s3a
fields.title: Opioid Overdose Count
fields.description: Number of times a person overdosed on heroin, fentanyl or other opioids during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.notes: Overdose means that you took enough of the drug that it caused a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you overdose on heroin, fentanyl or other opioids?  [Overdose means that you took enough of the drug that it caused a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention]
custom.jcoin:core_measure_subsection_text: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many times did you (CAN CODE 0 IF NEVER ON S2b). . .

fields.name: s3b
fields.title: Opioid Overdose Count: Receiving Naloxone
fields.description: Number of times a person received naloxone (Evzio or Narcan) to reverse your overdose during the past 90 days  (or prior to entering jail or prison/since last assessment).

custom.notes: Overdose means that you took enough of the drug that it caused a life-threatening reaction that required medical attention
custom.jcoin:core_measure_question: During the past 90 days [prior to entering jail or prison/since your last assessment], how many times did you receive naloxone (Evzio or Narcan) to reverse your overdose?
custom.jcoin:core_measure_subsection_text: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many times did you (CAN CODE 0 IF NEVER ON S2b). . .

custom.jcoin:core_measure_subsection_text: During the past xx days (since last assessment), how many times did you (CAN CODE 0 IF NEVER ON S2b). . .
